mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_photo, c.code_name, p.pet_name, p.pet_birthday, p.pet_gender, p.neutralization, p.medicine, p.special_note FROM tbl_pet_profile p INNER JOIN tbl_common_code c ON p.pet_type_code = c.code where p.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_pet_profile( user_no, pro_photo, pet_type_code, pet_name, pet_birthday, pet_gender, neutralization, medicine, special_note, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{proPhoto}, #{petTypeCode}, #{petName}, #{petBirthday}, #{petGender}, #{neutralization}, #{medicine}, #{specialNote}, #{userNo}, current_date)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_pet_profile SET pro_photo = #{proPhoto}, pet_type_code = #{petTypeCode}, pet_name = #{petName}, pet_birthday = #{petBirthday}, pet_gender = #{petGender}, neutralization = #{neutralization}, medicine = #{medicine}, special_note = #{specialNote} mod_user_no = #{user_no}, mod_date = current_date WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
